001package org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
005import com.fasterxml.jackson.datatype.jsr310.JavaTimeModule;
006import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.datetime.CoreDateTimeUtils;
007
008import java.util.LinkedHashSet;
009import java.util.Map;
010import java.util.Objects;
011import java.util.Set;
012import java.util.stream.IntStream;
013import java.util.stream.Stream;
014
015import static org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils.CoreStreamUtils.nameValue;
016
017/**
018 * A static-factory that provides an implementation of of {@link TreeDumper.Node}
019 * over {@link JsonNode}, which is the base data-unit that is provided by
020 * <a href="https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson?tab=readme-ov-file">Jackson-library</a>.
021 * <hr/>
022 * Utility-classes {@link DumpUtils}, {@link PrintUtils} and {@link ToFileUtils}
023 * use the default static instance of this class - {@link #DEFAULT_JACKSON_TREE} via {@link ObjectPrinter.UnitOp}.
024 */
025public class JacksonTree {
026
027    public static final ObjectMapper DEFAULT_MAPPER =
028        new ObjectMapper()
029            .registerModule(new JavaTimeModule())
030            .registerModule(CoreDateTimeUtils.jacksonModuleDTT());
031
032    static final JacksonTree DEFAULT_JACKSON_TREE = new JacksonTree(DEFAULT_MAPPER);
033
034    final ObjectMapper jacksonMapper;
035
036    /**
037     * An optional public constructor that allows to provide an instance of {@link ObjectMapper Jackson-ObjectMapper}
038     * that is different from the default one - {@link #DEFAULT_MAPPER}.
039     *
040     * @param jacksonMapper an instance of {@link ObjectMapper Jackson-ObjectMapper}
041     */
042    public JacksonTree(ObjectMapper jacksonMapper) {
043        this.jacksonMapper = jacksonMapper;
044    }
045
046    /**
047     * An entry-point of this static-factory, that is used as singleton
048     * over the predefined static instance of {@link ObjectMapper} - {@link #DEFAULT_MAPPER}.
049     * <hr/>
050     * In order to customize the default behavior you could either
051     * register additional {@link Module Jackson-ObjectMapper-Module}s
052     * or provide your own instance of {@link ObjectMapper Jackson-ObjectMapper}
053     *
054     * @param fromValue the object to build the Jackson-Tree from as an instance of {@link JsonNode Jackson-Tree-Node}
055     * @return the instance of {@link TreeDumper.Node}, which repeats the hierarchy of {@link JsonNode Jackson-Tree-Node}
056     */
057    public TreeDumper.Node dumperNode(Object fromValue) {
058        if (fromValue == null) {
059            return TreeDumper.NULL;
060        } else if (fromValue instanceof TreeDumper.Node dumperNode) {
061            return dumperNode;
062        }
063        JsonNode root = jacksonMapper.valueToTree(fromValue);
064        return fromJsonNode(root);
065    }
066
067    /**
068     * A factory-method that returns an implementation of {@link TreeDumper.Node}
069     * over {@link JsonNode}, which is the base data-unit that is provided by
070     * <a href="https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson?tab=readme-ov-file">Jackson-library</a>
071     *
072     * @param jsonNode an instance of {@link JsonNode}
073     * @return a proper implementation of {@link TreeDumper.Node}
074     */
075    public static TreeDumper.Node fromJsonNode(JsonNode jsonNode) {
076        if (jsonNode == null) {
077            return TreeDumper.NULL;
078        }
079        return switch (jsonNode.getNodeType()) {
080            case NULL -> TreeDumper.NULL;
081            case ARRAY -> new SequenceNode(jsonNode);
082            case OBJECT, POJO -> new MappingsNode(jsonNode);
083            default -> new ScalarNode(jsonNode);
084        };
085    }
086
087
088    abstract static class JacksonNode implements TreeDumper.Node {
089        protected final JsonNode jsonNode;
090        protected JacksonNode(JsonNode jsonNode) {
091            this.jsonNode = Objects.requireNonNull(jsonNode);
092        }
093    }
094
095    static class ScalarNode extends JacksonNode implements TreeDumper.ScalarNode {
096        protected ScalarNode (JsonNode jsonNode) {
097            super(jsonNode);
098        }
099        @Override
100        public String text() {
101            return jsonNode.asText();
102        }
103        @Override
104        public void visit(TreeDumper dumper) {
105            dumper.acceptScalar(this);
106        }
107    }
108
109    static class SequenceNode extends JacksonNode implements TreeDumper.SequenceNode {
110        protected SequenceNode (JsonNode jsonNode) {
111            super(jsonNode);
112        }
113        @Override
114        public Stream<TreeDumper.Node> sequenceItems() {
115            return IntStream.range(0, jsonNode.size())
116                .mapToObj(jsonNode::get)
117                .map(JacksonTree::fromJsonNode);
118        }
119        @Override
120        public void visit(TreeDumper dumper) {
121            dumper.acceptSequence(this);
122        }
123    }
124
125    static class MappingsNode extends JacksonNode implements TreeDumper.MappingsNode {
126        private final Set<String> fieldNames = new LinkedHashSet<>();
127        protected MappingsNode (JsonNode jsonNode) {
128            super(jsonNode);
129            jsonNode.fieldNames().forEachRemaining(fieldNames::add);
130        }
131        @Override
132        public Stream<Map.Entry<String, TreeDumper.Node>> mappingsItems() {
133            return fieldNames.stream().map(name -> {
134                JsonNode fieldNode = jsonNode.get(name);
135                return nameValue(name, fromJsonNode(fieldNode));
136            });
137        }
138        @Override
139        public void visit(TreeDumper dumper) {
140            dumper.acceptMappings(this);
141        }
142    }
143}
